page.title: 17 LIFE STYLES
page.content: Samantha and I interviewed Mr Darby about a normal day in his life. He has cereal or toast for breakfast. After breakfast he goes for a walk.He has dinner at 12,00.After dinner he sits down.Then he goes round the fields with a gun and shoots squirrels and rabbits.Then he has tea at 4,00. After tea he feeds the pheasants. Then he goes in and sits down then he does some work in his garden.When he comes in he watches some T.V. and then goes to bed. On a Monday morning I get up, get washed and dressed and have breakfast, which is Weetabix or Frosties.Dad then takes me to school. At 9,00 a.m. we go into school for assembley.Our morning subjects are maths and English.Lunch is at 12 noon.In the afternoon we have creative studies and sport.
